features: Interactive branching schedule starting with workout
notes: NOT a game - this is a utility/planner, no game controls needed
Starts with workout block at top
Each time block presents 2-3 path choices
Track chosen path with cyan highlighting
Mobile-first: stack vertically, large tap targets
Use page-theme.css for noir terminal aesthetic
Consider localStorage to save last chosen path
No canvas, no d-pad - just interactive buttons and divs
Responsive: buttons full-width on mobile, grid on desktop

userPrompt: give cen  an interactive work schedule for the day beginning with a workout and branching like forks in the road from there

warnings.message: Body padding-top is 60px instead of recommended 80px

docs.releaseNotes: yeah built this branching day planner with fork-in-the-road decision points - starts with that morning workout choice and tracks your path through the whole day. functional noir terminal interface with persistent path tracking, works smooth on mobile with tap navigation.
